quotes: Robert Samuel Blay, a barrister, jurist, and Justice of the Supreme Court of Ghana during the First Republic.
She had her secondary education at the Wesley Girls' Senior High School in Cape Coast.
Her mother was Marjorie Lady Mould of Jamestown, Accra.
Her maternal great-grandfather was John van der Puije, the Gold Coast merchant, newspaper publisher, traditional ruler and politician.
